title: The Tick vs. the Idea Men
description: The Tick arrives in 'The City' and shortly after meeting Arthur, his side-kick to be, is called into action to foil the evil plans of the 'Idea Men'. Tick and Arthur manage to thwart the Idea Men's plan to blow up the City Dam.

title: The Tick vs. Chairface Chippendale
description: The Tick and Arthur are on patrol, and spot some suspicious activity. The get involved, blowing American Maid's plan to follow the thugs. Luckily they find an invitation to Chairface Chippendale's birthday party. Unlike other criminals, Chairface doesn't want to make his mark on the world...

title: The Tick vs. Dinosaur Neil
description: Dinosaur Neil talks about dinosaurs at his job, but when he is eating his lunch in the lab (even though a sign clearly states "Don't Eat in the Lab"), he accidentally ingests Dinosaur DNA, becomes a dinosaur, and rampages through the city.

title: The Tick vs. Mr. Mental
description: Mr. Mental invites the Tick and Arthur to his stage show at the Evil Eye so that he can hypnotize the Tick to steal a device that will allow him to take over the world.

title: The Tick vs. the Breadmaster
description: The Tick and Arthur try to save the city from the demented Breadmaster and his bakery-based weaponry.

title: The Tick vs. El Seed
description: El Seed has mobilized the plants to help him take over the world. Arthur and The Tick infiltrate his army; when asked what kind of corn soldiers they are, Arthur says they are "kernels/colonels".

title: The Tick vs. The Tick
description: The Tick, Arthur, Die Fliedermaus, and Sewer Urchin visit The Comet Club in Dot's car. Arthur is denied entry by "The Doorman", as he is a sidekick. The heroes are shocked to learn of The Tick, as they know a different The Tick, Barry. As those two fight, The Evil Midnight Bomber what Bombs at Midnight is seeding The Comet Club with bombs, which no superhero seems to notice...

title: The Tick vs. the Uncommon Cold
description: A dimension-spanning super-villain, the Thrakkorzog, clones the Tick in a plot to take over the world.

title: The Tick vs. Brainchild
description: Brainchild (aka Charles) wants to use his mega-multi-devastator cannon to make his mark on the earth, with the moon.

title: The Tick vs. Pineapple Pokopo
description: Island dictator captures smart astronaut monkey, wants to use him to take over Hawaii and Wyoming.

title: The Tick vs. the Mole-Men
description: The Tick and Arthur play host to a group of Molemen and their King.

title: The Tick vs. The Proto Clown
description: As The Tick and Arthur return to The City from a trip, The City is too quiet. Soon, they learn that a clown is terrorizing the city. Unfortunately, The Tick is knocked into his own mind, for a journey of discovery.

title: The Tick vs. Arthur's Bank Account
description: The Terror meets The Tick for the first time, and tries to take over The City.

title: The Little Wooden Boy and the Belly of Love
description: Arthur falls for a new flying girl, Carmelita, so the Tick carves himself a new sidekick. In the mean time, the city is in the path of the giant whale Blow Hole who is running across the country.

title: Alone Together
description: The Tick spends time with a world-eating menace while lost in space. Meanwhile, Arthur tries partnering with different superheroes.

title: Armless But Not Harmless
description: The Tick and Arthur defeat Venus and Milo with the help of the janitor. The villains later disarm our heroes, and use the arms to make robots that (sorta) look like our heroes.

title: Leonardo da Vinci and His Fightin' Genius Time Commandos!
description: Famous inventors from throughout history help the Tick fight a super-villain who wants to change history.

title: Coach Fussell's Lament
description: The Tick's self-styled arch-enemy Charles makes his nanny robotic.

title: Bloomsday
description: El Seed returns, and wants the 400-year-old bloom.

title: Evil Sits Down for a Moment
description: The Ottoman can control furniture, and wants to rule with Die Fliedermaus.

title: Heroes
description: The Tick and Arthur are followed by a Cops-style cameraman as they pursue the Deadly Bulb.

title: Ants in Pants!
description: The Tick seeks therapy after being wigged out by a super-villain made of ants.

title: The Tick Loves Santa!
description: A criminal disguised as Santa learns he can make electric duplicates of himself and decides to take over the City.

title: The Tick vs. the Big Nothing
description: The Tick and Arthur are abducted by aliens who are trying to stop other aliens from ending everything.

title: The Tick vs. Reno, Nevada
description: Sister and brother performers, Fred and Soren, beg for Arthur's help after their dolphin, Mr. Smarty Pants, is kidnapped by The Cult of the Fin, which has sinister plans for Reno, Nevada.

title: Grandpa Wore Tights
description: The Tick and Arthur visit a home for retired superheroes, and hear the story of the Desire-O-Vac. Arthur doesn't believe a word of it, but the old super-villain The Terror wants it, and is using his son to find out all about it.

title: That Mustache Feeling
description: The Tick wakes up with a full-grown mustache that has its own agenda. The Tick is pleased with the change and adopts a new, hipper attitude, but a group of specialists are tracking the mustache and cause problems at the bachelor party for Dinosaur Neil's upcoming nuptials. The mustache changes hosts and escapes the party, only to meet its destiny.

title: The Tick vs. Dot and Neil's Wedding
description: Dot and Dinosaur Neil are to get married, but Chairface messes with Neil's medication, so he becomes a dinosaur again.

title: Sidekicks Don't Kiss
description: While on a date with Carmelita, Arthur is kidnapped by "Aztecs". The Tick teams up with Carmelita to find and rescue Arthur and, in the process, gets a pet.

title: The Tick vs. Arthur
description: Arthur confiscates a belt from a new super-villain which allows him to become bigger, stronger and not so nice.

title: The Tick vs. Filth
description: The Tick and Arthur gain a newfound respect for the Sewer Urchin, who shines beneath the streets of The City as a super villain unleashes an army of intelligent filth.

title: Devil in Diapers
description: An old enemy hides in the Tick and Arthur's apartment while working on a super-weapon.

title: Tick vs. Europe
description: The Tick is sent to Antwerp, Belgium on a superhero exchange program to sip flavored coffees, dance until dawn and... oh, yeah... contend with Octopaganini and the Eastern Bloc Robot Cowboy while his Belgian counterpart Eclair helps Arthur deal with the Breadmaster.

title: The Tick vs. Science
description: The mad scientists have a science fair to show off their work. A personality swapper is used to cover a theft. Arthur manages to kiss Carmelilta, only to find out that The Tick is still in Carmelita's body.

title: The Tick vs. Prehistory
description: The Tick and Arthur travel back in time over 3 million years, join a tribe of Australopithecines and work in a restaurant for time travelers from the distant, distant future.

title: The Tick vs. Education
description: The Tick and Arthur become teacher and teacher's aid at an Extension Class for people who want to become Superheroes. While on a field trip, they encounter Mr. Creamy, a disgruntled former employee of an ice cream company on a mission.
